pack.description: Cognitive Pack (CP): ultra-compact meaning map + evidence pointers (CPV1). Deterministic + budgeted: under truncation the engine removes low-priority lines first while preserving high-signal invariants. Under severe truncation the minimal pack is query-aware: contract-focused queries preserve CONTRACT evidence when present; entrypoint-focused queries preserve ENTRY evidence; otherwise preserve at least one runnable canon STEP (prefer test/eval) when present. Intended for LLM consumption.
